questions.question: A software company is developing a machine learning model to identify objects in photos. Before training the model, the team wants to use pre-training bias metrics to evaluate potential biases in the training data. The team wants to ensure that there is a balance of different classes of data in the dataset. Which pre-training metric could the company use to assess whether there is a balance between numbers of samples in each class of data?
questions.topic: 1.3 Validate Data and Prepare for Modeling
